Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases that underwent major revision cycles
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs afterward
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration until the next reviewer response activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Declined compared to the time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants involving Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the subsequent occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in complex reviewer selection paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured as the interval between its timestamp and the immediately preceding activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late)
Metric: the average of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' or `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants that eventually result in RW-EIC Accept
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where multiple reviewer agreements follow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in the longest-performing variant (performance = 47316796.000)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer No Response in comparison with time to SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Cycle Time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 interpreted as the duration from its execution until the closure of the reviewer assignment phase marked by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
